name: Later Planes
description:
Later Planes is a 3D Paper Plane simulation game in the dreamland.  There is no obstacles, action or any adventure. Just fly with Paper Plane and relax. Developed for PC platform with Unity game engine.

We designed this game at a 96 hours in The 2021 Community Jam. It is also third game jam i entered. The theme is "Uncontrollable Fate" and a paper plane always falls to the ground.

2020 was difficult for all of us. Let's rest and relax for a while. New year is a new beginning ✌️. Perfect for those who can't play Alfa :)

--- Controls --- 

Fly, watch around, listen to good music and relax.

Jump - Space :)

--- Developer ---

Ahmet Yağız - Game Designer, Game Developer, Level Designer
Suat Nurbaki Civelek - 3D Artist
Hasan Can Doğan Aydınlık - Background, Animator
